qas.question: How old was Schwarzenegger when he started hoping he'd move to America?
How old was Schwarzenegger when he moved to the U.S.?
In what state did Schwarzenegger claim his first Mr. Olympia title?
What's the name of the professional wrestler who designed the first logo for Gold's Gym?

context: Schwarzenegger, who dreamed of moving to the U.S. since the age of <a0_0>10<a0_0/>, and saw bodybuilding as the avenue through which to do so, realized his dream by moving to the United States in September 1968 at the age of <a1_0>21<a1_0/>, speaking little English. There he trained at Gold's Gym in Venice, Los Angeles, California, under Joe Weider. From 1970 to 1974, one of Schwarzenegger's weight training partners was <a3_0>Ric Drasin<a3_0/>, a professional wrestler who designed the original Gold's Gym logo in 1973. Schwarzenegger also became good friends with professional wrestler Superstar Billy Graham. In 1970, at age 23, he captured his first Mr. Olympia title in <a2_0>New York<a2_0/>, and would go on to win the title a total of seven times.
